root.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Zeonic Front
root.description: Overview:A mech game on the Playstation 2 based on the Mobile Suit Gundam franchise and took place only from the viewpoint of the Zeon forces, the evil forces in most Gundam shows. Following the events in the anime of the One Year War you command the Midnight Fenrir into several mech battles giving squad orders as well as piloting a mech yourself.

similar_games.game: Mobile Suit Gundam: Federation vs. Zeon
